Control.Name: ShowMarker
Control.Tooltip: Show specal list item markers on left, like the red enemy markers on the regular combat mode list

Control.Name: CleanCombats
Control.Tooltip: Automatically remove the oldest combats not open in a window, depending on current resource usage. During very long raids, some users may wish to disable this feature if they want to guarantee being able to see combats from the beginning of the raid. This feature allows for future data retention on reload. If enabled, the limit is currently 9mb. Memory usage is now much lower overall, and as well the meter is able to keep much larger set of data than before with very little performance impact.

Control.Name: SaveCombats
Control.Tooltip: Save combats between reloads or game loads

Control.Name: LineTextHeader
Control.Tooltip: See the Options Color tab for changing the row background colors and opacity

Control.Name: TruePlayerColors
Control.Tooltip: Change player colors to VortexTrueColors, by coasini

Control.Name: DefaultPlayerColors
Control.Tooltip: Change player colors to original defaults

Control.Name: Notice
Control.Text: The 'Auto Clear' and 'Save Combats' options are now enabled by default.

Control.Name: Details
Control.Text: These new features, available since 61016.0, retain data on reload and automatically manage memory and other resources, to finally provide a stable and care-free experience for new players. Some raid players may wish to disable 'Auto Clear' to guarantee capture of entire raid run. See options hover text for more information. Can type '/cm notice' to show this notice again.
